question.title: Is it possible to use come context-path for Wiremock/Wiremock-UI
question.body:
I am trying to use holomekc/wiremock-gui:3.x.x-alpine version as a Docker base image to create Docker file with wiremock UI. And my problem is that seems there is no way to set up some context-path in it to run all my mocked paths or '__admin' under that path.

Just let me add an example:

Docker file looks like

FROM {registry}/{repo}/wiremock-gui:3.x.x-alpine
COPY /mocks /home/wiremock
ENV WIREMOCK_OPTIONS = "--port 8080"
EXPOSE 8080
ENTRYPOINT ["/docker-entrypoint.sh", "--global-response-templating", "--disable-gzip", "--versbose"]

Docs: https://wiremock.org/docs/standalone/docker/ , https://wiremock.org/docs/standalone/java-jar/

Seems everything is okay if I use http://localhost:8080/__admin or http://localhost:8080/__admin/mappings. But I dont know how and where I need to set up maybe any property to change

http://localhost:8080/__admin into http://localhost:8080/**wiremock**/__admin

Is there any way? wiremock-gui repo: https://github.com/holomekc/wiremock
